org.springframework.integration.smpp.session

Interface ExtendedSmppSession

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.jsmpp.session.ClientSession, org.jsmpp.session.Session
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExtendedSmppSessionAdaptingDelegate

    public interface ExtendedSmppSession
extends org.jsmpp.session.ClientSession
    Represents an SMPPSession that has a few extra capabilities:

    1. supports registration of multiple MessageReceiverListeners
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Josh Long

    • Method Detail

      • addMessageReceiverListener

        void addMessageReceiverListener(org.jsmpp.session.MessageReceiverListener messageReceiverListener)
        a MessageReceiverListener implementation to be added to the set of existing listeners.

        NB: the contract for each of these is the same as for a single instance: don't take too long when doing your processing. This is even more important now that multiple implementations need to share the same callback slice time.

        Parameters:
        messageReceiverListener - the message receiver listener

      • getBindType

        org.jsmpp.bean.BindType getBindType()
        We need to know this to determine whether or not this session can handle the requirements we need.
        Returns:
        the BindType

      • start

        void start()

      • stop

        void stop()
